languages.text: Вольный Торговец принес{mf||ла} клятву Императору, что не станет исцелять свои раны, покуда не очистит корабль от ереси. Да ниспошлет Защитник Человечества сил свое{mf|му|й} слуге!

The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} will not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind grant His servant the strength to persevere!
languages.original_text: Вольный Торговец принес{mf||ла} клятву Императору, что не станет исцелять свои раны, покуда не очистит корабль от ереси. Да ниспошлет Защитник Человечества сил свое{mf|му|й} слуге!

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} would not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind give His servant the strength to persevere!

languages.text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat dem Imperator geschworen, dass {mf|er|sie} erst dann {mf|seine|ihre} Wunden versorgen wird, wenn das Schiff von allen Ketzern gesäubert wurde. Möge der Beschützer der Menschheit {mf|Seinem Diener|Seiner Dienerin} Kraft verleihen.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} will not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind grant His servant the strength to persevere!

traits.locale_text: {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} hat dem Imperator geschworen, dass {mf|er|sie} erst dann {mf|seine|ihre} Wunden versorgen wird, wenn das Schiff von allen Ketzern gesäubert wurde. Möge der Beschützer der Menschheit {mf|Seinem Diener|Seiner Dienerin} Kraft verleihen.

languages.text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a juré à l'Empereur de ne pas se préoccuper de ses propres blessures tant que le vaisseau n'aura pas été délivré de l'hérésie. Puisse le Protecteur de l'humanité donner à {mf|son serviteur|sa servante} la force de persévérer !
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} will not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind grant His servant the strength to persevere!

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a juré à l'Empereur de ne pas se préoccuper de ses propres blessures tant que le vaisseau n'aura pas été délivré de l'hérésie. Puisse le Protecteur de l'humanité donner à {mf|son serviteur|sa servante} la force de persévérer !

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha jurado al Emperador que no se detendrá a tratar sus heridas hasta que la nave esté purgada de herejía. ¡Que el Protector de la Humanidad dé a su sierv{mf|o|a} la fuerza para perseverar!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} will not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind grant His servant the strength to persevere!

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha jurado al Emperador que no se detendrá a tratar sus heridas hasta que la nave esté purgada de herejía. ¡Que el Protector de la Humanidad dé a su sierv{mf|o|a} la fuerza para perseverar!

languages.text: ローグトレーダーは皇帝に誓った。この船から異端が一掃されるまで、自身の傷を手当てするために足を止めることはしないと。人類の守護者がその従者に耐え抜く力をお与えくださいますように！
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} will not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind grant His servant the strength to persevere!

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーは皇帝に誓った。この船から異端が一掃されるまで、自身の傷を手当てするために足を止めることはしないと。人類の守護者がその従者に耐え抜く力をお与えくださいますように！

languages.text: 行商浪人向帝皇发誓，{mf|他|她}绝不会停下来处理伤口，直到这艘船上的所有异端分子被彻底消灭为止。愿人类的守护者庇护祂的仆人，赐予{mf|他|她}战斗到底的力量！
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} will not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind grant His servant the strength to persevere!

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人向帝皇发誓，{mf|他|她}绝不会停下来处理伤口，直到这艘船上的所有异端分子被彻底消灭为止。愿人类的守护者庇护祂的仆人，赐予{mf|他|她}战斗到底的力量！

languages.text: Hür Tacir, gemi kâfirliklikten arınana dek yaralarını sarmaktan vazgeçmeyeceğine yemin etti. İnsanlığın Koruyucusu, hizmetkârına muvaffak olması için gereken kudreti bahşetsin!
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader has made a vow to the Emperor that {mf|he|she} will not stop to tend to {mf|his|her} wounds until the ship is purged of heresy. May the Protector of Mankind grant His servant the strength to persevere!
